text: Christoffersson at Rockharz Open Air 2016 Janne "JB" Christoffersson is a Swedish singer and guitarist. He was the singer for the stoner metal band Spiritual Beggars and plays guitar and sings for the heavy metal band Grand Magus. On 20 August 2013, JB was confirmed to be featured in the new Ayreon album The Theory of Everything. == References == Category:Swedish heavy metal guitarists Category:Swedish male singers Category:Living people Category:Spiritual Beggars members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: JB (Swedish musician)
